Honestly  when I watch this, it made me realize how much as you get older , you have to educate and make sure your kids learn to stand on their own , support them , love them , teaching them right and wrong . No matter what happens , know thereâ€™s always light at the end of the dark tunnel â¤ï¸ 

We live in a world where we continue to have more problems : socially , physically , academically , politically , it really shows how much as you get older , you have to learn from your mistakes , your parents and everyone else mistakes to make sure you or your love ones , friends and family em members donâ€™t go down the same path . As my family member would say , always learn . Always be open minded , learn and see that life is like a school, thereâ€™s always something new to learn . You learn in any area to grow yourself , and your family and community . So donâ€™t stop learning . Learn too grow and your obstacles wonâ€™t slow you anything .
